resources.string: This device does not support Camera2 API.

Welcome to the Visual Companion app.This app will help you navigate through your daily life by utilizing the capabilities of this application.\n\nTo navigate to the next page, please swipe to the left.

The front page features 4 buttons. Each button has a different functionality. To hear the functionality of each button, " click on the button once. To navigate to that functionality, press and hold the button. To navigate to the main page from the functionality, swipe down to up. This will vibrate your device for 1 second, to let you know, as well as tell you that you are navigating back to the front page.\n\nTo navigate to the next page in this introduction, please swipe to the left.

The first feature is Optical Character Recognition. To use this feature, press and hold the OCR button on the main page. Once you\'re on the OCR page, hold your phone towards the text you want to read. \n\nTo navigate to the next page in this introduction, please swipe to the left.

The second feature is Currency Detection. To use this feature, press and hold the Currency Detection button on the main page. Once you\'re on the Currency Detection page, hold your phone towards the money you want to read and press anywhere on the screen. \n\nTo navigate to the next page in this introduction, please swipe to the left.

Object detection function. To use this feature, press and hold the object detection button on the main page. Once you\'re on the Object Detection page, tap anywhere on the screen. The application will detect objects in the immediate vicinity of the camera and inform you about these objects and their location. \n\nTo navigate to the next page in this introduction, please swipe to the left.
To finish this tutorial, press anywhere on the screen. This will take you to the main page of the application that consists of all the mentioned functionalities.
